DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis: A high cardiovascular risk is present in subjects with pre-diabetes in Hong Kong Chinese. The investigators plan to assess Chinese subjects in Hong Kong who have pre-diabetes (impaired fasting glucose, IFG; or impaired glucose tolerance, IGT) based on oral glucose tolerance test (OGTT) on their cardiovascular risk status such as obesity, hypertension and lipid profile.
DOC.brief_title: A Survey to Evaluate the Cardiovascular Risk Status of Subjects With Pre-Diabetes in Hong Kong
DOC.criteria: Hong Kong Chinese with confirmed IFG or IGT by OGTT Confirmed diabetic patients
